references.paper_title: Apprenticeship learning via inverse reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper is foundational to inverse reinforcement learning (IRL), a related area that the current paper contrasts against, highlighting the direct policy-space approach of behavior cloning.
This paper is a seminal work on behavior cloning (BC), the core learning paradigm addressed in the current paper, providing the initial framework and terminology.

references.paper_title: Machine teaching for inverse reinforcement learning: Algorithms and applications
references.reason: This paper connects machine teaching with IRL, which the current paper contrasts to its work on machine teaching for behavior cloning.
This is a highly influential paper in the theory of machine teaching, exploring the fundamental complexity of teaching tasks, relevant to the current paper's analysis of teaching dimension.

references.paper_title: The teaching dimension of linear learners
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the teaching dimension of linear learners, a crucial concept used by the current paper when studying the family of linear BC learners.
